78486539.name: TME
78486539.description: This code package is for the Tensor-Maximum-Entropy (TME) method. This method generates random surrogate data that preserves a specified set of first and second order marginal moments of a data tensor, which makes it well equipped to test for the null hypothesis that a structure in data is an epiphenomenon of these specified set of primary features of the data tensor. The random surrogate data are sampled from a maximum entropy distribution. This distribution unlike traditional maximum entropy method have constraints on the marginal first and second moments of the tensor mode.

See README for the original blog posts and links to their repositories.
